jobDescription:
529329BR

Introduction

Cloud Engineers are the technical experts and advisors to clients, IBM sales teams and/or IBM Business Partners. As a Cloud Engineer you understand the client's business requirements, technical requirements and/or competitive landscape. Cloud Engineer partners closely with Solution Architect, Data Scientist, Designer and other Cloud Engineers as a team in Minimum Viable Product (MVP) development. You apply technical expertise into technical engagement to support presales activities amto ensure clients see the business values of IBM solution. This is an opportunity to shape the future for both IBM and its clients. Start your journey now!

Your Role and Responsibilities

Cloud Engineers in IBM Client Engineering are part of a cross-functional team delivering a unique client co-creation experience to accelerate client transformation. As part of an entrepreneurial team, you will use contemporary technologies and approaches to design, develop, test, and deliver solutions. You will apply a user-centric approach to ensure all features add value for the user and achieve the desired client impact. You understand the nuances of different cloud solutions (hybrid, public, private, multi-cloud, on-prem) and implications for solution design. You understand the relationship among various technologies and architectures and how they contribute to the overall solution. You will develop a deep understanding of complex, large scale multi-region solutions which utilize multiple independent life cycle microservices. An ideal candidate will be familiar with Design Thinking, Behavior and Test-Driven Development, and application of Agile methodologies.

The Responsibility Includes

 Uses contemporary technologies and approaches to design, develop, test and deliver Cloud-based solutions Applies a user-centric approach to ensure all included features and value for the user and achieve desired client impact Understands the nuances of different cloud solutions and implications for solution design Understands the relationship among various technologies and architectures and how they contribute to an overall solution Deep understanding of complex large scale multi region solutions that are utilizing multiple independent life cycle microservices

 Employ IBM's Design Thinking to create products that provide a great user experience along with high performance, security, quality, and stability; ensure that the implemented solutions are unit tested and ready to be integrated into their product Demonstrate a growth mindset and continuous learning; stay current on IBM strategy and offerings with understanding of technical principles of Docker and Kubernetes Demonstrate strong analytical, problem solving and troubleshooting skills combined with keen desire to develop quality code in an Agile process Design, code, and test innovative component-level solutions in areas such as cloud foundation, cloud services, cloud management applications, machine learning, computational linguistics, natural language processing and security applications Use DevOps practices and methods to plan and create software applications Partners with the client and IBM Client Engineering team to enable a continuous integration environment leading to successful Minimum Viable Product (MVP) development Analyzes client development environment to champion DevOps and CI/CD practices

 Experienced in Cloud platform, infra & services Programming Experience in multiple languages such as Java, Nodejs, Typescript, Python, Go and so on.  Certified Kubernetes Application/App Developer OpenShift Certified Administrator IBM, AWS, Azure, OpenSource cloud engineer certification

Being You @ IBM

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Google will be prioritizing applicants who have a current right to work in Singapore, and do not require Google's sponsorship of a visa.

15 years of experience leading strategy, consulting and/or digital transformation engagements.Experience building advisory relationships at the C-level of large, complex organizations.Experience in a cloud computing environment or equivalent experience in a customer facing role.

Preferred qualifications:
Experience engaging and influencing both technical and non-technical audiences from developer to CEO.Ability to lead with enthusiasm and flexibility in a fast-paced, constantly evolving team environment.Ability to learn, understand and work with new emerging technologies, methodologies, and solutions in the cloud/IT technology space.

About The Job

The Google Cloud Platform team helps customers transform and build what's next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. Our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life. As part of an entrepreneurial team in this rapidly growing business, you will play a key role in understanding the needs of our customers and help shape the future of businesses of all sizes use technology to connect with customers, employees and partners.

As a Strategic Advisor for Google Cloud, you'll lead cross-functional teams of experts to help customers design, plan, implement, and govern enterprise cloud strategies.

You will embody executive level qualities, lead the conversation, and direct the execution of the sales team by combining both technical vision and business insight. You will also partner with Value Engineering in order to articulate the true total value of each technical solution and the overall business partnership with Google Cloud.

Google Cloud provides organizations with leading infrastructure, platform capabilities and industry solutions. We deliver enterprise-grade cloud solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology to help companies operate more efficiently and adapt to changing needs, giving customers a foundation for the future. Customers in more than 150 countries turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to solve their most critical business problems.

Responsibilities

Set and influence the strategy of engagement, bring industry and technology credibility with the C-level, and help Sales teams reach agreements and ensure our strategic partners realize the business outcomes they expected out of our partnership.Help prospective customers adopt products and services. Identify cloud related design/development/deployment friction points from the customers’ perspective and rally teams to work through solutions. Influence product and solutions strategy across functional and product area boundaries to bring the best of Google to the customer.

The Emerging Solutions Intern will complete an 18-24 week program from Jun to Dec 2022. Selected candidates will be invited to submit a video interview, and top candidates will be invited to our office to attend an assessment event. Offers will be extended following the event.

Project Description

The cost to sequence a human genome is rapidly decreasing and will approach $100 in the coming years. This is driving the creation of multi-omic data sets, population sequencing of multi-million sample human cohorts, gene expression profiles of millions of cells from a single sample, experiments to characterize the functional consequences of all possible variants in a gene, and surveys of the complete human immune repertoire… and this is just the beginning.

To derive value and insights from these incredibly deep and varied data sets, genomics has become an information science, requiring investment in modern data engineering, data science, and machine learning capabilities. Applications range from personalized health care to genetics-informed drug discovery.

Towards this end, Illumina is enabling the creation of extremely large clinical-genomic datasets and pioneering the application of novel analytical methods, including artificial intelligence, to this data.

The successful candidates will play a key role in advancing this vision, working across internal teams and with external partners to identify and develop new capabilities, while also contributing directly with focused analytic and engineering work.

Roles And Responsibilities
Work collaboratively with teammates, other teams within Illumina, and with external collaborators and partners to apply novel genomic data sets and tools to personalized medicine, drug development, and other emerging applications.Contribute to the development and implementation of our tools to better allow the use of large genomic data sets in these emerging applications.Work with Illumina software engineering colleagues to deploy these techniques to internal and external users on a cloud-deployed platform.Contribute to pilot studies with partnersCommunicate effectively across the research and informatics organizationsLearn and have fun!
Qualifications And Requirements
Must be currently enrolled in an undergraduate program, ideally in Computational Biology, Biomedical Engineering, Computer Science, Biomedical Science or EngineeringCompetent in at least one software programming language, preferably Python (or R) for data analysis and visualizationPassion for technology, healthcare, and personalized medicineExcellent interpersonal and communication (English – both oral and written) skills, along with the ability to communicate appropriately and confidently with colleagues from a wide range of backgrounds and seniority levelsExcellent analytical and problem-solving skillsSelf-motivated, resourceful and proactiveCurious and observative, in order to rapidly comprehend the research and development environment to deliver fit for purpose results to the project teamExperience with database technologies (SQL & no-SQL) and ETL from varied data sources is preferred
Learning Objectives

This internship opportunity aims to provide students whose interests lie beyond academic research with practical experience of how they can apply the knowledge they have acquired in alternate roles.

The goals are to help the student achieve the following learning objectives:
Real-life experience in prototyping and developing new data science and software solutions in an emerging space in personalized medicine and drug development.Hands on project experience analysing and reporting computational results to research project teams Develop strong interpersonal and communication skills

About TikTokTikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.
Team IntroductionThe Cloud Infrastructure team, based in Singapore, supports many of our star products and core business lines, serving hundreds of millions of users every day. We actively embrace open source and innovative software/hardware architecture, building a series of infrastructure to ensure the best R&D practices and enable the overall development of the company.
The big data Computing Engine team is responsible for TikTok and its affiliates' offline computing, streaming computing and real-time computing engine. We support many core businesses and teams such as AML, recommendation, warehouse, search, advertising, streaming media, as well as security and risk control.
Offline computing is mainly based on Spark, with the average number of daily tasks reaching hundreds of thousands of instances, covering ETL, offline data processing, adhoc queries and other scenarios. We support all our internal recommendation / advertising / search and other large-scale data processing of a large number of core businesses.
Streaming computing is mainly based on Flink, with the total number of tasks reaching as high as tens of thousands, covering multiple business scenarios such as ETL, real-time monitoring, real-time features, etc. We also support the construction of our internal real-time data warehouse and streaming-batch integration business scenarios.
The real-time compute engine is based on self-research, covering real-time warehouse, real-time online services, high-frequency updates , online feature store and other machine learning scenarios. We also support a series of internal advertising, live broadcasts, recommendation, and other scenes that require data processing and real-time online services.
What you will be doing:R&D for an efficient, real-time and reliable distributed computing engine;R&D for our distributed computing platform and machine learning training job scheduling system. Optimize its stability, performance and other aspects;Achieve an in-depth understanding of our business model and ideate abstract solutions to solve business problems.
What you should have:Proficient in Java/Python/C++ and other programming languages and common algorithms, with large-scale distributed system R&D and optimization capabilities;In-depth research and relevant experience in the open source computing framework (Hadoop MapReduce/Spark/Flink is preferred);In-depth research and related experience in the cluster resource management system (Hadoop Yarn/Mesos/Kubernetes is preferred).
Preferred QualificationsIn-depth research and experience in machine learning training and scheduling framework;Experience in ultra-large scale cluster operation and management.

jobTitle: Customer Engineer, Small/Medium Businesses, Google Cloud (Korean)
jobDescription:
Google will be prioritizing applicants who have a current right to work in Singapore, and do not require Google's sponsorship of a visa.

Minimum qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.Experience with cloud computing concepts such as Big Data, Platform-as-a-Service and Infrastructure-as-a-Service (PaaS and IaaS) technologies. Experience with presenting and delivering technical pitches.Ability to speak and write in Korean fluently to engage and support Korean-speaking customers to navigate industry standards.

Preferred qualifications:
Experience serving in the capacity of a technical sales engineer in a cloud computing environment or equivalent experience in a customer-facing role.Experience with compute infrastructure and networking concepts including: routing, VPNs, load balancers, and firewalls.Experience in and understanding of data and information management as it relates to big data trends and business challenges. Experience using and/or managing databases.Ability to quickly learn, understand, and work with new emerging technologies, methodologies, and solutions in the Cloud/IT technology space.

About The Job

The Google Cloud Platform team helps customers transform and build what's next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. Our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life. As part of an entrepreneurial team in this rapidly growing business, you will play a key role in understanding the needs of our customers and help shape the future of businesses of all sizes use technology to connect with customers, employees and partners.

As a Customer Engineer, you'll help shape and execute technical business strategies, acting as a trusted advisor to our clients and helping them to realize maximum business value from Google Cloud. You'll assist the Sales team by problem-solving key technical issues for our customers, while also liaising with the product marketing management and engineering teams to stay up-to-date on industry trends and to devise enhancements to Google Cloud products.

Google Cloud accelerates organizations’ ability to digitally transform their business with the best infrastructure, platform, industry solutions and expertise. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology – all on the cleanest cloud in the industry. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.

Responsibilities

Work with account executives to explore opportunities from the technical perspective, and collaboratively set the opportunity pursuit strategy. Develop the strategy to resolve technical impediments and scoping out migration workloads.Take responsibility for technical aspects of solutions to include such activities as managing product and solution briefings, proof-of-concept work, and the coordination of supporting technical resources.Work with Google Cloud products to demonstrate and prototype integrations in customer/partner environments.Prepare and deliver product messaging in an effort to highlight Google Cloud value proposition using techniques to include whiteboard and slide presentations, product demonstrations, white papers, trial management, and documents.Translate technical concepts to non-technical and executive Korean-speaking audiences. Utilize Korean language skill to help support customers for that market directly.

Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Sourced ValuesIntegrity, Innovation, Service, Quality, Humility, Sustainability
What you’ll be responsible forWorking closely with technical leads and client teams to fully demonstrate the benefits of cloud technologyHelping to build & introduce clients to automated delivery pipelines (CI/CD)Defining and implementing cloud-based solutions in line with industry best practices and enterprise architecture guidelinesSupporting customers in troubleshooting issues in their test and/or production environments and identifying root cause and solutionsPresenting case studies and cloud solutions at meetups, conferences and technology events
What you will bring to the role7+ years of enterprise IT consulting experienceBachelor’s degree in Engineering, Information Technology, Computer Science or a related fieldExperience in large-scale, secure, and high availability solutions in the AWS Cloud environmentExperience in cloud deployment templating using offerings such as CloudFormation and/or TerraformAn understanding of public cloud security principals and experience adhering to compliance standardsProgramming/scripting experience with Python, Bash, Terraform, or otherExperience working with source code management using GitExperience working with configuration management technologies such as Puppet, Chef, and/or AnsibleExperience with CI/CD methodologies, processes, and tools, such as Jenkins, CodePipeline, CodeDeploy, or otherKnowledge of logging & event management tools such as Splunk, ELK or otherExperience in preparing and presenting technical material to a variety of audiences
Desirable SkillsExperience working in the financial services sectorDatabase experience with SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL or otherExperience with network design, subnetting, and routingProfessional and/or Specialty level AWS certificationsExperience in working with microservices or serverless architectureExperience working with containers using Docker
About SourcedSourced is a rapidly growing global consultancy with offices in multiple regions. Founded in 2010, we provide consulting services to migrate enterprise clients to hyperscale cloud providers. We specialize in organisation-wide cloud transformation and DevOps enablement for a wide range of industries, including financial services, healthcare, aviation, media, and telecommunications. We work with some of the largest and most security-conscious organisations around the world to help them unlock innovation through cloud computing.
Why Sourced? Sourced offers huge growth opportunities in an innovative, collaborative and inclusive environment. We have regular team social events, individual career development plans, supportive management and team members, training budget to utilise every year, monthly educational workshops, global relocation packages, as well as a generous employee share option plan! We provide opportunities to work on challenging technology solutions, whilst encouraging and aiding the ongoing professional development of our team.
Sourced Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating a safe, diverse and inclusive environment. We encourage qualified applicants of all backgrounds including ethnicity, religion, disability status, gender identity, sexual orientation, family status, age, nationality, and education levels to apply. If you are contacted for an interview and require accommodation during the interviewing process, please let us know.

jobTitle: Software Engineer (RPC Framework / Service Mesh), Cloud Infrastructure
jobDescription:
About TikTokTikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.
Team IntroductionThe Cloud Infrastructure team, based in Singapore, supports many of our star products and core business lines, serving hundreds of millions of users every day. We actively embrace open source and innovative software/hardware architecture, building a series of infrastructure to ensure the best R&D practices and enable the overall development of the company.
The Microservice Framework team focuses on in-depth research on programming languages, RPC frameworks, and high-performance middleware. We provide the company with research and development frameworks, high-performance middleware, service mesh, and unified SOA Governance platforms. Among them, the Golang framework (KiteX) has been applied to tens of thousands of services carrying over billions of QPS in total and is at the forefront of the industry in terms of performance and scalability. Service Mesh and our traffic management platforms cover most of the company's businesses.
What you will be doing:Design and develop microservice RPC frameworks for Golang/Java/Python/Rust;Design and develop our Service Mesh system;Design and develop our traffic management platforms.
What you should have:Proficient in one or more programming languages such as Golang/Java/Python/Rust;Strong interest in technologies such as RPC frameworks/Service Mesh/traffic management systems;In-depth understanding of RPC principles and frameworks such as gRPC/bRPC/dubbo/thrift;In-depth understanding of the key areas of microservice governance and its implementation.
Preferred QualificationsExperience in contributing to open source projects;Practical experience with Service Mesh systems.

jobTitle: Account Executive, Marketing Cloud - Malaysia, Indonesia and Vietnam
jobDescription:
To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.

 Job Category Sales Job Details 

We are seeking a proven sales performer to help us grow Marketing Cloud within the Small Medium Business segment in Malaysia, Indonesia and Vietnam. This is a role for someone who is a hunter and hungry for new business success.

Responsibilities include generating new business in new accounts and also expanding the footprint inside existing customers, as well as playing a key role as you drive strategic Marketing Cloud initiatives for our customers.

This is a role for someone who can see the value of Marketing Cloud and who can be a combination salesperson and evangelist to get the Marketing Cloud penetration into the segment growing even more.

On top of your own business development, we provide a range of support functions to help create and drive opportunities from internal sales support to highly skilled pre-sales so it is not just you against the world.

Responsibilities
Developing and managing relationships within our Small Medium Segment focusing on customers in Malaysia, Indonesia and VietnamManaging complex sales-cycles and presenting to C-level executives the value of Marketing Cloud.Forecast sales activity and revenue achievement while creating satisfied and reference-able customers.Demonstrating our product via the Web.
Requirements
3-5 years of experience carrying quota and closing deals in software (business applications preferred) or technology sales.Experience selling to customers in Malaysia, Indonesia and VietnamConsistently over-achieved quota (top 10-20% of company) in past positions.Successful track-record managing complex deals from lead to close.Fluency in English required and ideally one local language preferred.

Strong and demonstrated written and verbal communications skills.Previous Sales Methodology training preferred.Strong preference for Digital Marketing/MarTech/AdTech sales experience.Ability to work in a fast pace, team environment.Strong customer references.Strong computer skills, including CRM, Microsoft Word, PowerPoint and Excel.

jobTitle: 2022 H2 Internship (Jul - Dec): Intern - Business Technology (Special Project)
jobDescription:
About Workato

Workato is the only integration and automation platform that is as simple as it is powerful — and because it's built to power the largest enterprises, it is quite powerful.

Simultaneously, it's a low-code/no-code platform. This empowers any user (dev/non-dev) to painlessly automate workflows across any apps and databases.

We're proud to be named a leader by both Forrester and Gartner and trusted by 7,000+ of the world's top brands such as Box, Grab, Slack, and more. But what is most exciting is that this is only the beginning.

Why join us?

Ultimately, Workato believes in fostering a flexible, trust-oriented culture that empowers everyone to take full ownership of their roles. We are driven by innovation and looking for team players who want to actively build our company.

But, we also believe in balancing productivity with self-care. That's why we offer all of our employees a vibrant and dynamic work environment along with a multitude of benefits they can enjoy inside and outside of their work lives.

If this sounds right up your alley, please submit an application. We look forward to getting to know you!

Also, feel free to check out why:
Business Insider named us an "enterprise startup to bet your career on" Forbes' Cloud 100 recognized us as one of the top 100 private cloud companies in the world Deloitte Tech Fast 500 ranked us as the 17th fastest growing tech company in the Bay Area, and 96th in North America Quartz ranked us the #1 best company for remote workers 

Workato is the operating system for today's fast-moving business. As a high growth company with over 6000 customers, Workato is revolutionizing the integration and automation market with investments from the top 3 SaaS companies - Salesforce, Workday, ServiceNow. Recognized as a leader by both Gartner and Forrester, it is the only AI-based platform that enables both business and IT to integrate their apps and automate workflows across their enterprise with robust security and governance. Some of the world's top brands including Slack, Grab, Box, Visa, Broadcom run on Workato.

We are looking for an exceptional Intern - Business Technology (Special Projects) to join our growing team. In this role, you will work closely with our Business Systems, Business Intelligence & Business Security Teams. Being the vital link between IT and business function, you will empower teams to respond quicker to changing business needs. For a glimpse into what a Business Technology Intern does in Workato, refer to our Inside Workato's Kitchen ebook, which includes projects and processes that our team has accomplished internally over the past year.

Workato has a positive, diverse, and collaborative culture—we look for people who are curious, inventive, smart, hardworking and work to be a little better every day. Workato has also been recognized amongst the "Top 47 Enterprise Startups to Bet Your Career On in 2020" and the "Hottest 13 Productivity Software Startups to watch in 2020!" by Business Insider.

Responsibilities
Design and implement a scalable framework that seeks to provide an accurate cost of our technology stack. Be the expert in managing and maintaining Workato's SaaS Spend management tool, Productiv. Perform data validation within Productiv by going through vendor contracts and understanding various billing models. Assist in building our existing in-house Application Optimization Framework to drive optimization initiatives. Building of automations using Workato Recipes to automate repetitive and manual tasks. 

Requirements
Currently pursuing a degree in Business, Information Systems, or other related field. Having a process-oriented mindset. Knowledge on how to perform basic data analysis is required. Basic understanding of SQL language is a bonus. Fast mover and comfortable navigating a fast-paced environment. Excellent organizational skills and ability to juggle multiple projects simultaneously. Strong analytical skills, verbal and written communication skills are required to present actionable insights to business leaders. Thoughtful team player, a keen learner, and have a "can do" attitude with a growth mindset. Interns who will be able to commit on a full-time basis for at least 6 months will be preferred. 

Why Workato?
Supportive, collaborative, international team environment that supports remote employees (currently all of us!) Long-term prospects for a professional career in a high growth company. Flexible work culture. Be part of a community-oriented organization with a history of giving back. Best in class technology tools to empower you to do your best work. Support for professional development and continuous learning. Wellness programs, including fitness challenges and an occasional company day off to recover from Zoom fatigue. Company-sponsored team-bonding activities and team celebrations. 

What is the Interview Process?

If your application is shortlisted, you will be asked to complete a take home technical test to help you gain a better understanding of the Workato platform, as well as for you to demonstrate your technical capabilities, problem-solving and communication abilities.If you are further shortlisted, you will be invited for the next set of interviews. An offer will be made if you pass the interviews.

jobTitle: Pooling: Schneider Graduate Program Associate - Supply Chain (PH, SG, ID, TH, VN)
jobDescription:
Great People make Schneider Electric a great company.

Do you dream of working in a company that is driven by a meaningful purpose and that continuously creates an inclusive environment where you are empowered to do your best and be innovative?

The Role: Schneider Graduate Program Associate – Supply Chain

Schneider Electric has launched rebranded Graduate Program that focuses on building and developing future digital leaders.

We are looking for top STEM talents that has the passion to drive innovation and has the dare to disrupt attitude by applying their know-hows and expertise in the fields of Cloud Computing, Software Engineering, Big Data and AI, IOT, Blockchain and AR/VR.

The program consists of three rotations over the course of two years. Throughout these rotations we will train you in different areas of the company’s Global Supply Chain Business so that you can become a well-rounded employee that makes an impact at Schneider Electric.

We have crafted a tailored onboarding process to train you in each function and ensure your success. There will be a mixture of in-person and online training, some as a group and others individually. You will also be paired with our digital transformation leaders to mentor and provide career guidance

Career Pathways: 

The program is designed to breed the next generation of digital leaders that will fuel the Dare to Disrupt and innovation culture here in Schneider Electric. As a young talent you have the opportunity to showcase your capabilities worldwide as a digital transformation agent for a certain business domain or be one of our top "EDISON" tech experts in our global supply chain technology teams

Who would be successful? 
You must be a fresh graduate or less than 1 year of working experience.Candidate must be a Bachelor or master’s degree in engineering or related fields. Preferably also holding a degree in information technology, computer science, data analytics, data science, RPA, machine learning, software engineering and mathematics.Aligned with the Schneider Electric’s core values Dare to DisruptExcellent academic credentials and leadership qualitiesMust be dynamic, flexible and can work in a fast-paced environment. Excellent communication skills in English (written/spoken)Work locations: Indonesia, Singapore, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam
More details about Early career at Schneider Electric , please visit https://www.se.com/th/en/about-us/careers/your-experience-level.jsp

SELECTION PROCESS:

Round 1 – Online Application

Complete your application with a detailed resume and other supporting documents (transcripts of record, ID Card, certificates…) and a 10 min video on your perspective on digital transformation and innovation.

Round 2 – Online Assessment

LSEG Labs provides a unique opportunity to work in a global company within a team with the culture of a start-up.

LSEG Labs

LSEG Labs investigates the application of new technologies to LSEG financial products and services. Technologies we are investigating or actively using include financial NLP, machine learning and graph databases. The team itself is multi-disciplinary, comprising specialists in financial research, data science, software engineering and design.

Product or Service
Labs are involved in a large range of projects leveraging a multitude of different technologies so a successful candidate is unlikely to be assigned to a single product or service. Information about specific projects would be discussed in the course of the interview process. As a part of our growing Singapore Lab team of data scientists, engineers and UX/UI designers you will be part of our network of like-minded colleagues across Singapore and LondonLabs projects have recently included analytics based on equity sentiment, FX events, trading transaction costs and building a Custom Financial Language ModelOur team offers a great flexible working environment, values curiosity and supports an open and learning culture for all levels of experience & seniority. 
Key Responsibilities
Perform scientific research into the latest methodologies and technologies to solve LSEG customer problems in the field of finance Work with the sustainable finance team to scope and build proof-of-concepts / prototypes using state-of-the-art data science, ML and NLP techniquesConceive, develop, and test algorithms with tools like Python, AWS, etc. Locate, clean and wrangle data. Integrate internal and external data sources using API’s Explain experiment results concisely to other members in the Labs 
Internship duration

Minimum 3 months (from May 2022 onwards)

QualificationsGraduate student in a related technical field, such as computer science, statistics, finance, applied mathematics, physics, , or a related discipline is preferred.Undergraduates who have completed previous internships in the field of Financial Data Science can also apply (should have completed atleast 2 years of undergraduate education)Experience in one or more of these preferred : Natural Language Processing Machine Learning  Deep LearningExperience working with programming and scripting languages such as: Python (preferred)  R MATLABExperience in Relational SQL Databases and Data Science related cloud tools is required
Bonus
Interest or prior experience in the field of sustainable finance is a bonusBig data analytics (Spark, Hadoop, Hive, Impala, Solr, etc.) 
At LSEG, we believe that creating a diverse and inclusive organisation is fundamental to the way we deliver on our promise – and our purpose. You’ll be part of an organisation of over 25,000 people, spanning 70 countries. We recognise the individual perspectives each of our colleagues brings, and our diverse workforce is one of our greatest strengths. In supporting collaboration and creativity and encouraging new ideas across a diverse and inclusive workforce, we can improve how we are driving financial stability, empowering economies and enabling customers to create sustainable growth.

LSEG offers a range of tailored benefits and support from healthcare and retirement planning to paid volunteering days and wellbeing initiatives.

jobTitle: Telecom Data & Analytics Business Development Leader, APJ
jobDescription:
Job Summary

DESCRIPTION

Would you like to enable some of the largest telecom operators in the world transform the ways in which they use data for predicting customer needs, preventing inefficiencies and delivering personalized experiences? Have you been a part of creating and delivering digital and analytics strategies for major Telcos?

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a dynamic and rapidly growing business within Amazon and the leader in providing secure, reliable, scalable, and innovative cloud services that help businesses across the globe scale and grow. The AWS Telecom Business Development team is looking for an experienced candidate to lead Data Management and Analytics Go-To-Market, driving significant adoption of data, analytics and AI/ML solutions for our largest telecom customers.

This is a senior role, with an Asia-Pacific remit, to guide customers in accelerating their digital transformations by building data-driven organizations, and enabling business outcomes leveraging AWS’ database, analytics, AI and ML technologies. You will help our telecom customers accelerate this journey by engaging with the customers' business and technology stakeholders to create a compelling vision of a data-driven enterprise in their environment; helping them learn from examples of industry leaders, reference architectures and define what “great” looks like for their data-driven enterprise.

This role may be located in Sydney or Singapore, and will strive to create alignment among customer stakeholders, address resistance to change and provide a tangible, executable vision to transition to a cloud computing model. They will operate effectively at multiple levels of the organization and can address concerns across C-suite executives, marketing/LOB leaders, data science practitioners, and established platform teams.

You will represent the AWS telecom data strategy and be the leading voice for AWS telecom data-focused solutions. You will leverage worldwide programs, campaigns and work closely with the wider AWS business development, product management, marketing, solutions architecture, partner and professional services teams to position the AWS telecom data strategy for telecom customers and partners.

The ideal candidate will possess a telecommunications business- and data analytics background (preferably including machine learning), with a foundation of having directly led sales / pre-sales / consulting engagements and interactions at the highest levels of large telecom operators and technology partners. The candidate should have proven expertise at thought leadership, conceptualizing customer-centric solutions, convincing C-Level executives, line of business leaders and IT architects, and having seen through successful sales to delivery cycles.

Additionally, the ideal candidate will have a demonstrated ability to think strategically and long-term about the needs of complex global businesses. The ideal candidate will also be deeply familiar with complex legacy IT environments, managed enterprise IT infrastructure services, telecom enterprise applications, and has done market analysis, deal negotiation/shaping, with an awareness of field enablement techniques.

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.


Basic Qualifications
 Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or a related field 15+ years of experience in client related interactions, including executive presentations, relationship management, deal structuring and commercials negotiation, including working with partners in a consortium framework 10+ years of related experience in data management and data architecture 3+ years experience in analytics roadmaps, including machine learning Experience managing / advising on data operations, data strategy, data governance, metadata management, or data quality management discipline
Preferred Qualifications
 Masters in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or applicable field, or MBA Experience creating and executing organizational change management strategies as part of a larger transformation Program oversight experience in a Sales / Business Development capacity, including planning, prioritization, successful project completion and maintaining a focus on high standards and quality Experience with machine learning Experience with data architecture, data system and tools, related software, and data management policies and practices in a complex organizational environment Experience in evaluating on-premise vs cloud computing models AWS Cloud certifications
What if I’m not an expert in all the above? That’s okay. We hire people who have a passion for learning, and are curious to build, learn and grow. You will be supported in your career development here at AWS. You will have plenty of opportunities to build your technical, leadership, business and consulting skills. This will include formal and on the job training, and a chance to learn and upskill through AWS certification courses and mentorship. You will learn from and collaborate with some of the brightest technical minds in the industry today. If you want to work with the best cloud technologies from the world’s leading cloud provider, apply now. We can’t wait to see what you build here. Come build the future with AWS.

CULTURE AND COMMITMENT TO INCLUSION, DIVERSITY & EQUITY

At AWS, we welcome all builders. We believe that technology should be built in a way that’s inclusive, accessible, and equitable. We’re committed to putting in the work for more equal representation.

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

533089BR

Introduction

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities

At IBM, we believe in putting smart to work. In applying technologies to solve some of the biggest challenges benefiting individuals, businesses and the world. At the core, it means building a talented team of specialists to deliver innovative solutions with IBM technologies. Our internship program is aimed at identifying and developing talent from an early stage to create a pipeline of top tiered candidates to join IBM in full time roles.

IBM Singapore is looking for candidates in the fields of computer science, engineering and mathematic to join our Data, AI and Automation team for a 5-month internship. The Data, AI and Automation team is the heart of our strategy to leverage AI and Hybrid Cloud to create a competitive edge for our clients. If selected, you will be working with and learning from team of multi-disciplinary technology experts. Working with other interns in the program, you will have the opportunity to create prototypes that solves real world business problem for some of the largest companies in Asia Pacific using IBM technologies. We intend to provide an environment to foster creativity where you can take ownership of the solution that you are building. If working in one of the top tech companies and exercising your skills and creativity sounds exciting to you, then you may be the candidate that we are looking for.

The selected candidate will work together with fellow interns in a project to create a compelling MVP to show case IBM technologies. With one of the largest software portfolio in the IT industry, the team will be able to leverage a wide range of capabilities in Data, AI, Hybrid Cloud and Automation. The intern team will be working closely with one of more project advisor(s) to define the project scope, design and implement the MVP to show case relevant business values. This internship is designed for candidates to expand their technical knowledge, work with experts from IBM and exercise their creativity. If you looking for a typical internship with restrictive tasks and deliverables, this one may not be for you. However, if you are looking to take ownership of your project and work on interesting problems to impress top corporations in the region, this one is definitely for you.

Your Role And Responsibilities

Learn about the latest technologies and industry trends for AI Operations, Site Reliability Engineering, Robotic Process Automation, DevOps and more Work with your mentor to define the project scopeLearn about best methodology like Design Thinking and Agile Development, then put them into practiceWork in a team with the fellow intern(s) to create solutionManage a development project with a tight time lineAnd have fun!

About You

Exposure in Application Development and DevOps, IT Operations, and/or Hybrid Integration (e.g. APIs, Events)Background in Information Technology, Computer Science or Engineering

SG_hotjobs

Required Technical and Professional Expertise

We Are Looking For Students In The Field Of

Data Science or Statistics Computer Science or EngineeringHuman Factors and HCIInformation Technology

Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise

As above.

About Business Unit

IBM has a global presence, operating in more than 175 countries with a broad-based geographic distribution of revenue. The company’s Global Markets organization is a strategic sales business unit that manages IBM’s global footprint, working closely with dedicated country-based operating units to serve clients locally. These country teams have client relationship managers who lead integrated teams of consultants, solution specialists and delivery professionals to enable clients’ growth and innovation. By complementing local expertise with global experience and digital capabilities, IBM builds deep and broad-based client relationships. This local management focus fosters speed in supporting clients, addressing new markets and making investments in emerging opportunities. Additionally, the Global Markets organization serves clients with expertise in their industry as well as through the products and services that IBM and partners supply. IBM is also expanding its reach to new and existing clients through digital marketplaces.

Your Life @ IBM

Are you craving to learn more? Prepared to solve some of the world's most unique challenges? And ready to shape the future for millions of people? If so, then it's time to join us, express your individuality, unleash your curiosity and discover new possibilities.

Every IBMer, and potential ones like yourself, has a voice, carves their own path, and uses their expertise to help co-create and add to our story. Together, we have the power to make meaningful change – to alter the fabric of our clients, of society and IBM itself, to create a truly positive impact and make the world work better for everyone.

It's time to define your career.

About IBM

IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.

Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business.

At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.

Location Statement

For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.

Being You @ IBM

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

Acronis is dedicated not just to cyber protection but to the general protection of its potential and current employees, interviews are being held virtually during the current global COVID-19 situation.

Our fast-paced and dynamic work environment will challenge you and get you closer to reaching your full potential. Acronis will give you the platform and tools you need to build and grow your career. You will find yourself surrounded by bright, talented, hardworking, passionate and fun-loving individuals.

What You’ll Do
You will need to understand and analyze product requirements and communicate with product management teams. You will be involved in develop test design of user scenarios, test cases and checklists, prepare test environments, execution of manual functional testing, reporting and processing defects.You will also be involved in collection of comprehensive and relevant data for problem investigation. You will prepare test analytics for automation scenarios, interact with automation team. Analyze customers’ issues and investigate their root causes and participate in technical discussions with RnD teamsImplement autotest on Python or TypeScript/JavaScript, extend autotests frameworks in company

Basic knowledge of Quality Assurance theory: principles, methodologies and techniquesProficiency in both Linux and Windows operating systems with knowledge in installing, configuring and troubleshootingFamiliar with Virtualization systems (optional)Analytical mindset, ability to solve complex logical puzzlesKnowledge of basic programming/scripting principles would be an additional advantageUnderstanding of basic concepts of computer architecture, data structure and IT securityPython or TypeScript/JavaScript languages and test frameworks
Who We Are

Acronis is revolutionizing cyber protection by integrating backup, disaster recovery, storage, next-generation anti-malware, and protection management into one solution. This all-in-one integration offers easy, complete, and affordable data protection for all workloads, applications, and systems across any environment—physical, virtual, cloud, and mobile. Enhanced by its award-winning AI-based active protection technology, blockchain-based data authentication and unique hybrid-cloud architecture, Acronis removes the the complexity and risks associated with non-integrated solutions.

Acronis is in an exciting phase of rapid-growth and expansion, recently receiving a $250 million investment from CVC Capital Partners, bringing the total valuation to more than $2.5 billion. Founded in Singapore in 2003 and incorporated in Switzerland in 2008, Acronis is truly a global organization with more than 1,900 employees in 33 locations in 18 countries. Its solutions are trusted by more than 5.5 million consumers and 500,000 businesses, including 100% of the Fortune 1000 companies. Acronis’ products are available through 50,000 partners and service providers in over 150 countries in more than 30 languages.

Acronis is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, marital status, national origin, physical or mental disability, medical condition, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.

Trustwave is a leading cybersecurity and managed security services provider that helps businesses fight cybercrime, protect data and reduce security risk. Offering a comprehensive portfolio of managed security services, security testing, consulting, technology solutions and cybersecurity education, Trustwave helps businesses embrace digital transformation securely. Trustwave is a Singtel company and the global security arm of Singtel, Optus and NCS, with customers in 96 countries. 

The candidate should be passionate about applied research and development of cutting-edge security technologies. Prior experience in technology commercialization and a good understanding of cyber security related products and solutions are also required. With a strong desire to work on problems with real-world impact and commercial value, the candidate will conduct world-class applied research by working closely with a team of security domain experts. Particularly, the candidate is expected to identify emerging threats, and design, develop and productize innovative solutions.

Duties & Responsibilities:

 Formulate security problems based on real-world requirements and industry needs Conduct research, developing innovative solutions that results in new intellectual properties Work on multiple projects, as individual contributor Develop high-quality prototypes, and assist in productizing or integrating solutions with products for commercializing of next generation security technologies Contribute to cyber security business directions and go-to-market strategiesRequirements:

 Bachelors/Masters degree, with background in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field; and preferably having experience in security and data analytics Strong programming and development skills in state-of-the-art machine learning and deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.) Sound technical knowledge and expertise in Applied Statistics, Machine Learning and Deep Learning Experience in one or more of the following areas is a plus: Network security, System security, Anomaly and threat Detection, and Cloud and data security Excellent written and verbal communications skills Highly motivated, independent and resourceful team player Strong analytical thinking, interpersonal and problem solving skills

Company Overview

H2O.ai is the open source leader in AI with a mission to democratize AI for everyone. H2O.ai is transforming the use of AI with software with its category-creating visionary open source machine learning platform, H2O. More than 18,000 companies use open-source H2O in mission-critical use cases for Finance, Insurance, Healthcare, Retail, Telco, Sales and Marketing. H2O Driverless AI uses "AI to do AI" in order to provide an easier, faster and cost-effective means of implementing data science. H2O.ai partners with leading technology companies such as NVIDIA, IBM, AWS, Intel, Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud Platform and is proud of its growing customer base which includes Capital One, Progressive Insurance, Comcast, Walgreens and MarketAxes. For more information and to learn more about how H2O.ai is driving an AI Transformation, visit www.h2o.ai.

Responsibilities and Duties:

As an AI Application Engineer in H2O.ai Professional Services team you will work closely with Technical teams on the Customer side and Customer Success, Enterprise Support, Product Engineering and Sales teams on the H2O side.

Your primary responsibilities would be one or more of the following
Develop AI Applications which integrates with AI models and workflows Contribute in designing and architecting end to end AI based solutionsImplement solutions on/integrating with H2O AI Hybrid Cloud on KubernetesTroubleshoot and debug AI applications deployed Explore external datasets and develop data ingestion pipelines Integrate the machine learning models/pipelines (python and mojo scoring pipelines) with customer systemsWork on understanding data models of customers and integrate with H2O’s AI Platform

Your Additional Responsibilities Include
Be the trusted solutions advisor for our customers and partners. Communicate effectively with a diverse audience of internal and external stakeholders consisting of: Engineers, business people, partners, executives. Translate business cases and requirements into value based technical solutions through the architecture of machine learning workflows and systems from data ingestion to model deployment. Present at meetups and webinars in the Data Science community, and be an integral part of the Maker culture of creating the best products and solutions. 

Experience and Skills:

Experience
3 to 5 years of experience with cloud computing/linux systems, Python and applications development1 to 2 years of experience with kubernetes based application development and deployment.

Programming Languages/Frameworks
Experience in Python, Java, Bash scripting is a must haveExperience with writing REST API using micro services frameworks in Python (Django)

Data Engineering Skills
Building data pipelines, ETL data sets preferably on ‘big data’Understanding of SQL query language and working with relational databases. Understanding of various NoSQL database types and their application scenarios

Data Science Skills
Knowledge of basic statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.)Experience in creating visualizations in Python or R using graphing libraries such as matplotlib, ggplot, plotly, seaborn, etc

System Engineering Skills
Understanding of system engineering concepts and good command of working in a linux based environment (OS fundamentals etc). Ubuntu and CentOS/RHEL mainly.Understanding of the cloud ecosystem i.e. what solutions exist on the 3 major clouds (AWS, GCP, Azure) and when/how to use those components

Additional Requirements
Experience of working in a customer facing environment, providing technical servicesExcellent communication skills (verbal and written, English language). Amicable attitude. Aptitude to independently investigate and find solutions to technical problems; urge to learn/master new technologies. Maker mindset.

H2O.ai Perks!
Flexible work hours and time off.Opportunity to work closely with some of the best engineering talent and the best data scientists/Kaggle Grandmasters in the world.

Inside this Business Group

Intel's Sales and Marketing (SMG) organization works with global customers and partners to solve critical business problems with Intel based technology solutions. We work across numerous industries, including retail, enterprise and government, cloud services and healthcare as examples. The operations team focuses on forecasting, driving alignment with factory production and delivering efficiency tools and our marketing capability drives demand and localized marketing in locations around the globe. Our sales force navigates a complex partner and customer ecosystem while shaping product roadmaps, driving value for our customers, and collaborating to harness emerging technology trends to deliver comprehensive solutions.

Other Locations

Malaysia, Penang

Neuron is the leading shared micromobility operator in APAC and has also expanded into the United Kingdom, South Korea and Canada. We partner with cities to connect people and places in a safe, convenient and fun way. We are driven to help the world build a more prosperous and sustainable future through new ways of moving and connecting.

Neuron launched the world's first docked e-scooter in Singapore in 2016 and the first shared e-scooter programme in 2017. We develop our own industry-leading e-scooters, which are purpose built for sharing and safety. We also set the industry standard for technology that manages them. Neuron has launched an impressive range of world firsts, particularly when it comes to safety. We currently operate in several cities across ANZ, three in the United Kingdom, two in South Korea and most recently launched in Canada.

The Role

You would have the opportunity to be a critical member of Neuron's data team and be involved in various exciting projects that contribute to the growth of business. This role will provide a great opportunity of learning and exposure to data engineering, data analytics and cloud services.

What You'll Do:
ETL pipelines creationMachine learning data processingMachine learning apps provisioningData migration and integrationData pipeliningBusiness analytics reporting and dashboarding

What You'll Need: 
Current studies in Computer Science, Information System, Computer Engineering, or other data related fieldsAble to commit at least 3 days a week for 6 months or 5 days a week for 3 monthsGood understanding of cloud service, databaseProgramming experience, preferably SQL and PythonKnowledge of tools like Gits, Jira, docker and etc is a plusExperience managing activities or projects is a plus.Adaptable self-starter with strong willingness to learn and strong work ethic and ability to handle different work streams under time constraints.Comfortable operating in a cross-functional and hyper-growth environment

Our Values

Make It Happen

Drive to deliver results with the highest impact and be committed to follow through. Continuously optimise through collaboration to achieve the best collective outcomes.

Be Proactive

Take active steps and be the driver to improve things, for yourself, your team and the cities we serve. Relish the chance if this leads you outside your normal scope.

Trust Facts Over Opinions

Decisions should be evidence-based. Assess situations fairly, using reason and logic rather than unverified opinions wherever possible.

Stay Curious

Ask questions, challenge assumptions, learn from mistakes and be ready to leave behind what you thought you knew before.

Do More With Less

Both time and resources are finite. Balance your priorities and think strategically about how you can maximise your impact and the return on investment of your resources.

If you are passionate about making a real-time impact and want the opportunity to play an instrumental part in our growth story, we want you riding for our team!

Neuron Mobility is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to making all employment decisions including recruitment, appointment and promotion decisions on the basis of business needs, individual qualifications, and merit.

Why will you enjoy this new opportunity? 

The Academy Training program is designed to fast track our new graduate hires from training into successful careers in the Worldwide Sales and Services organization. We offer you in-depth training focused on our most exciting technologies, while growing your skills throughout the progression.

At VMware, we believe that software has the power to unlock new opportunities for people and our planet. We look beyond the barriers of compromise to engineer new ways to make technologies work together seamlessly.

Our software forms a digital foundation that powers the apps, services and experiences that are transforming the world.

Success in the Role: What are the performance outcomes after Academy Program you will work toward completing? 

The Associate Consultant will work with our highly talented and experienced VMware Professional Services Team to deliver creative solutions to our customers to help unlock the benefits of our VMware products. In this role, you will use your technical, consultative, communication, and leadership skills to support the successful implementation of VMware software solutions (Cloud, Mobility, Network/Security) in a variety of industry verticals and customer environments.

You will have the opportunity to work directly with the client and other team members on the day-to-day tasks involved with the solution delivery, including, but not limited to: planning, customer assessments, system configuration, testing, training, troubleshooting, and technical issue resolution.

The Work: What type of work will you be doing? What assignments, requirements, or skills will you be performing on a regular basis? 

A typical day of a consultant are as follows:

Engage with customers, to gather requirements and information of customer’s infrastructure environment and technological roadmapConduct workshops with customers to detail the decisions for the design of the virtual infrastructureDraft documents pertaining to the agreed upon design, taking into consideration the overarching business intent and roadmapCollaborate with internal team and VMware partners to ensure successful project delivery and ensure the solution is appropriately addressing customer’s problemsImplementation of the solution, whether on-field or remotely, with configurations according to the agreed designConduct testing to ensure the functionality and interoperability of the standalone solution as well as with other solutions implementedConduct workshops to properly educate and update the customer of the things implemented in their environmentSupport and collaborate with sales team, to drive conversations of future projectsAttend courses and training to properly equip self with knowledge and hands-on experience

Preferred Skills

BSc in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems or related. A self-motivated person with a love of technology and consulting, that will give their all to exceed goals and develop their career dreams. Customer focused, an outgoing individual that can build rapport easily, no matter what situation. A good listener with strong empathy skills, who can tune into customers and anticipate their needs.Someone who loves to collaborate, has strong business ethics and phenomenal communication skills.  Resilient and positive, with a strong drive for results and the ability to both deal with ambiguity and thrive in a collaborative high-energy environment. Passionate about technology and how it is changing the world for the better, especially within the cloud computing technologies space. Hands on IT experience from either Internships, Co-Ops, Work Experience and/or Projects.Leadership experience through either leading extracurricular activities (e.g. university clubs/committee) or volunteer work.It is a plus to have application development and coding experience. 

What is the leadership like for this role? What is the structure and culture of the team like? 

The role would be reporting into Darren Teo, Senior Manager - Services Delivery. It is a big team, and we work cohesively together to achieve results as one team.

Are you looking to become a member of a talented team and help transform the sales and channel landscape? If so, we would love to hear from you!

Where is the role located? 

Singapore. Non-remote. Flexi-work arrangement allowed.

Title: Associate Solutions Engineer (Presale Engineer) 

Why will you enjoy this new opportunity? 

The Academy Training program is designed to fast track our new graduate hires from training into successful careers in the Worldwide Sales and Services organization. We offer you in-depth training focused on our most exciting technologies, while growing your skills throughout the progression.

At VMware, we believe that software has the power to unlock new opportunities for people and our planet. We look beyond the barriers of compromise to engineer new ways to make technologies work together seamlessly.

The role would be reporting into the Manager of Solutions Engineering team within Southeast Asia & Korea. It is a big team, and we work cohesively together to achieve results.

Acronis is dedicated not just to cyber protection but to the general protection of its potential and current employees, interviews are being held virtually during the current global COVID-19 situation.

We are looking for a highly motivated person with a strong desire to learn and dig deep and who is just as excited about innovation, technology and quality as we are.

Our fast-paced and dynamic work environment will challenge you and get you closer to reaching your full potential. Acronis will give you the platform and tools you need to build and grow your career. You will find yourself surrounded by bright, talented, hardworking, passionate and fun-loving individuals.

What You’ll Do
You will work within a growing research and development team to improve existing and build brand new Acronis products.You will work closely with Product managers, Architects, Security, Operations and QA through all phases of software development lifecycle.Design and develop distributed, highly scalable efficient microservices for data protection and cyber security features in Acronis products.You continuously improve your own and your teammates technical skills via mentoring, code reviews and feedback.You should be open to jumping into unfamiliar codebases, languages and start contributing.
What You Bring (experience & Qualifications)
Preferably a degree in computer science or equivalent engineering education or relevant work experience in IT industryProficient with Go, C++ or Python, but willing to work in Go.Experience with developing microservices for cloud products and REST APIsStrong knowledge on datastores like PostgreSQL/ MySQL/Elasticsearch is expectedExperience in Python, knowledge of Pytest or other test automation frameworks and tools would be a plusHands-on Docker and Kubernetes experience will be added advantageExperience with Agile and CI/CD tools such as Jenkins is preferred
Who We Are

Acronis is revolutionizing cyber protection by integrating backup, disaster recovery, storage, next-generation anti-malware, and protection management into one solution. This all-in-one integration offers easy, complete, and affordable data protection for all workloads, applications, and systems across any environment—physical, virtual, cloud, and mobile. Enhanced by its award-winning AI-based active protection technology, blockchain-based data authentication and unique hybrid-cloud architecture, Acronis removes the the complexity and risks associated with non-integrated solutions.

Acronis is in an exciting phase of rapid-growth and expansion, recently receiving a $250 million investment from CVC Capital Partners, bringing the total valuation to more than $2.5 billion. Founded in Singapore in 2003 and incorporated in Switzerland in 2008, Acronis is truly a global organization with more than 1,900 employees in 33 locations in 18 countries. Its solutions are trusted by more than 5.5 million consumers and 500,000 businesses, including 100% of the Fortune 1000 companies. Acronis’ products are available through 50,000 partners and service providers in over 150 countries in more than 30 languages.

Acronis is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, marital status, national origin, physical or mental disability, medical condition, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.

jobTitle: Intern at APJ IO Digital Labs for AI Prototypes
jobDescription:
What We Offer

Our company culture is focused on helping our employees enable innovation by building breakthroughs together. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from. Apply now!

About The Team

The APJ Innovation Office Digital Labs team is a part of the regional presales-organization at SAP. We are a diverse team of UX designers, data scientists and developers crafting business process flows, designing exciting mockups and building amazing prototypes for our customers. We work distributed in several countries as Singapore, Japan, Korea, India and Australia.

In this role, you'll

We are looking for a highly-motivated and customer-focused individual with a strong interest on machine learning prototype creation. This involves using our SAP business solutions as well as the SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) which is SAP’s cloud platform for our customers.

We are offering exciting prototyping projects to work in the field of connected plants, Internet of Things (IoT), Digital supply chain and more. We like to combine disciplines, so machine learning scenarios are often a part of what we do. Endpoint AI (“TinyML”) could be another field of work where we have use cases to build.

In your role you would work on an assignment where a business use case must be brought with the help of latest SAP and Non-SAP technologies to a working prototype. These prototypes will then be used for customer demonstration, in our Experience Center, events and social media activities.

Who You Are

We’re looking for someone who takes initiative, perseveres, and stay curious. You like to work on meaningful innovative projects and are energized by lifelong learning.

The expectation is to work with support of our Digital Lab team on:
Work on a prototype using SAP and Non-SAP technology for a business use case involving the creation of a machine learning model and deployment. This can also be in combination with IoT or digital supply chain related topics.Working together as a team of interns to plan together, share work packages.Learn how to plan, manage, and run projects with Scrum.Document and present the outcomes of the prototype.
Education and qualifications/ Skills and Competencies needed for this role:
University student, preferably from Information TechnologyHands on experience in developing innovative applications using modern technology platforms and cloud infrastructures such as AWS, Azure, or SAP BTP. Programming expertise in any of these fields: C, C++, JavaScript/ Node.js or Python. Exposure to machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, scikit-learn)Knowledge of ONNX is a plus.Knowledge of Docker and/or Kubernetes will be useful.Fluency in English is a MUST, any other language an asset.
We are SAP

SAP innovations help more than 400,000 customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with 200 million users and more than 100,000 employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, we build breakthroughs, together.

Our inclusion promise 

SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.

SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com.

EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.
